txt.en: Retrieve cured meats from the nearby crate
Children can be found around Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should deliver the cured meats to the children of Trestlebridge.
Deliver the cured meats to the children of Trestlebridge ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Delivered the cured meats to the children of Trestlebridge ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Has all the cured meat been delivered? Very good, my friend. You have done well in assisting the Brotherhood, [placeholder].'

'It is important that those who dwell in Trestlebridge trust the Woodcutter's Brotherhood. We are here to protect the village and make the village a better place, after all!\n\n'With that said, I would like you to deliver these cured meats to the children of Trestlebridge. They are certainly deserving of sharing in the bounty. It makes the hard work that we have been putting into the Wildwood worth it!'
Those who dwell in Trestlebridge have gone through much hardship, and the Woodcutter's Brotherhood know that they can and must assist the village.
A crate of cured meats can be found nearby in Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should retrieve the cured meats from the crate.
Nessa Larch can be found in Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should talk to Nessa Larch.
